TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RecognizerIntent extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: Constants for supporting speech recognition through starting an Intent

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(native int javaReference, valuetype Android.Runtime.JniHandleOwnership transfer) cil managed

Docs.param: A containing a Java Native Interface (JNI) object reference.
Docs.summary: A constructor used when creating managed representations of JNI objects; called by the runtime.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: A broadcast intent which can be fired to the BroadcastReceiver component specified in the meta-data defined in the #DETAILS_META_DATA meta-data of an Activity satisfying #ACTION_WEB_SEARCH.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Starts an activity that will prompt the user for speech and send it through a speech recognizer.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Starts an activity that will prompt the user for speech without requiring the user's visual attention or touch input.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Starts an activity that will prompt the user for speech, send it through a speech recognizer, and either display a web search result or trigger another type of action based on the user's speech.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Meta-data name under which an Activity implementing #ACTION_WEB_SEARCH can use to expose the class name of a BroadcastReceiver which can respond to request for more information, from any of the broadcast intents specified in this class.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The extra key used in an intent which is providing an already opened audio source for the RecognitionService to use.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The extra key used in an intent to the speech recognizer for voice search.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: A float array of confidence scores of the recognition results when performing #ACTION_RECOGNIZE_SPEECH.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Optional IETF language tag (as defined by BCP 47), for example "en-US".

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Informs the recognizer which speech model to prefer when performing #ACTION_RECOGNIZE_SPEECH.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The key to the extra in the Bundle returned by #ACTION_GET_LANGUAGE_DETAILS which is a String that represents the current language preference this user has specified - a locale string like "en-US".

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Optional limit on the maximum number of results to return.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Specify this boolean extra in a broadcast of #ACTION_GET_LANGUAGE_DETAILS to indicate that only the current language preference is needed in the response.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Optional value which can be used to indicate the referer url of a page in which speech was requested.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Optional boolean to indicate whether partial results should be returned by the recognizer as the user speaks (default is false).

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Optional boolean, to be used with #ACTION_RECOGNIZE_SPEECH, #ACTION_VOICE_SEARCH_HANDS_FREE, #ACTION_WEB_SEARCH to indicate whether to only use an offline speech recognition engine.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Optional text prompt to show to the user when asking them to speak.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: An ArrayList<String> of the recognition results when performing #ACTION_RECOGNIZE_SPEECH.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: When the intent is #ACTION_RECOGNIZE_SPEECH, the speech input activity will return results to you via the activity results mechanism.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: If you use #EXTRA_RESULTS_PENDINGINTENT to supply a forwarding intent, you can also use this extra to supply additional extras for the final intent.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Optional boolean to indicate that a "hands free" voice search was performed while the device was in a secure mode.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The amount of time that it should take after we stop hearing speech to consider the input complete.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The minimum length of an utterance.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The amount of time that it should take after we stop hearing speech to consider the input possibly complete.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The key to the extra in the Bundle returned by #ACTION_GET_LANGUAGE_DETAILS which is an ArrayList of Strings that represents the languages supported by this implementation of voice recognition - a list of strings like "en-US", "cmn-Hans-CN", etc.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Optional boolean, to be used with #ACTION_WEB_SEARCH, to indicate whether to only fire web searches in response to a user's speech.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class Android.Content.Intent GetVoiceDetailsIntent(class Android.Content.Context context) cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the broadcast intent to fire with Context#sendOrderedBroadcast(Intent, String, BroadcastReceiver, android.os.Handler, int, String, Bundle) to receive details from the package that implements voice search.
Docs.returns: the broadcast intent to fire or null if not available

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: To be added.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Use a language model based on free-form speech recognition.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Use a language model based on web search terms.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: This API supports the Mono for Android infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Docs.value: A which contains the java.lang.Class JNI value corresponding to this type.

Docs.summary: This API supports the Mono for Android infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Docs.value: A which provides the declaring type.
